passive.name: FURY OF THE DRAGONBORN
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) FURY OF THE DRAGONBORN
                                Slaying a Large Monster grants 10 stacks of Draconic Bloodline.Champion takedowns or slaying the Rift Herald or Baron Nashor grants 15 stacks of Draconic Bloodline.Slaying a Dragon grants 35 Draconic Bloodline.Every 100 stacks of Draconic Bloodline enhances one of Shyvana's abilities.

q.name: (Q) TWIN BITE
q.description:
(Q) TWIN BITE
 8.5/7.5/6.5/5.5s  
                                
                                
                                Empowers Shyvana's next attack to strike twice, dealing 58 (100% ) and 12 (20/40/60/80% ) physical damage respectively. Attacks reduce the Cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.Dragon Form: Strikes in a larger area and applies on-hits to all enemies.Acquiring 100 stacks of Draconic Bloodline grants Weight of the Mountain, causing Twin Bite to slow enemies hit by 50% while in Dragon Form.

w.name: (W) BURNOUT
w.description:
(W) BURNOUT
 15/14/13/12s  
                                
                                
                                Deals 40 magic damage (40/55/70/85 + 30% bonus ) per second to nearby enemies and hastes Shyvana by 30/35/40/45%, decaying over 3 seconds. Attacking extends the duration of Burnout by 4 seconds.Dragon Form: Expands the flames, dealing damage in a larger area.Acquiring 200 stacks of Draconic Bloodline, grants Wings of the Cloud, causing Burnout to haste Shyvana by an additional 25% while in Dragon Form.

e.name: (E) FLAME BREATH
e.description:
(E) FLAME BREATH
 11/9.8/8.8/7.8s  
                                
                                
                                Launches a fireball that deals 78 magic damage (60/110/160/210 + 30%  + 40% ) to enemies hit and Scorches them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's attacks on Scorched enemies deal bonus magic damage equal to 3% of their max health.Dragon Form: The fireball explodes on impact, dealing 139 magic damage (110 + 50%  + 70% ) in an area and leaving a fire for 4 seconds that deals 40 magic damage (34 + 10%  + 20% ) and Scorches enemies within it.Acquiring 300 stacks of Draconic Bloodline, grants Breath of the Infernal, converting the damage dealt to Scorched enemies to True Damage while in Dragon Form.

r.name: (R) DRAGON'S DESCENT
r.description:
(R) DRAGON'S DESCENT
 1s  
                                
                                 100 
                                Passive: Generate 1.5/2/2.5 Fury per second and 2 Fury per attack. At 100 Fury Shyvana can cast Dragon's Descent. Shyvana remains in Dragon form until she has consumed all of the Fury.Active: Transform into a Dragon, gaining 300/400/500 Health and flying to a target location. Enemies along Shyvana's path take 150 magic damage (150/250/350 + 80% ) and are knocked towards her landing point.Acquiring 400 stacks of Draconic Bloodline, grants Life of the Ocean, gaining 15% Omnivamp  in Dragon Form.

boots_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
boots_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.
Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.
